scripts.copy:cors-proxy-package:win32: echo "Copy cors-proxy package not supported on Windows"
scripts.podman:build:
yarn run run-script-if --bool $([ $(command -v podman) ] && echo true || echo false) --then "podman build $(echo $(build-env corsProxy.image.buildTags) | xargs printf -- "-t $(build-env corsProxy.image.registry)/$(build-env corsProxy.image.account)/$(build-env corsProxy.image.name):%s
" | xargs echo) -f Containerfile" --else "echo Podman not found, skipping image build."
